CenteredX(Component) - Method in class additionalFrames.SplashScreen

chat_initialization() - Static method in class mainChat.Application
 
ChatMessage - Class in webSocket
Class that describes the "Object" messages sent from (and to) the users The below class is then converted in json format by MessageEncoder.java class Please note that this class is equal to the server correspective.
ChatMessage() - Constructor for class webSocket.ChatMessage
 
ChatMessage(String, ChatMessage.Type) - Constructor for class webSocket.ChatMessage
 
ChatMessage(String, ChatMessage.Type, ChatMessage.Param) - Constructor for class webSocket.ChatMessage
 
ChatMessage.Param - Class in webSocket
This inner class exist to encapsulate all the optional parameters of a message for e.g. the users list sent by a "User List" request, or a nickname notification on connection.
ChatMessage.Param() - Constructor for class webSocket.ChatMessage.Param
 
ChatMessage.Type - Enum in webSocket
Type ofChatMessage.
